samples.title: Vacation Leave
samples.Description: A sample image of a vacation leave application filled with dummy data, demonstrating the proper format and content for requesting time off for a vacation.

samples.title: Departmental Leave
samples.Description: An example image of a departmental leave application containing dummy data, showcasing the correct structure and content for requesting time off within a specific department.

samples.title: Leave Accumulation
samples.Description: A sample image of a leave accumulation application filled with dummy data, illustrating the appropriate format and content for requesting the accumulation of vacation leave.

samples.title: Sick Leave
samples.Description: A sample image of a sick leave application filled with dummy data, demonstrating the proper format and content for requesting time off due to illness.

samples.title: Report
samples.Description: An example image of a report filled with dummy data, illustrating the standard structure and content for creating a professional report from scratch.

samples.title: Witness Statement
samples.Description: An example of a five part witness statement explaining each section.
